title: Create COMPANY-has-brand Relationship
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to be able to connect BRANDS to a COMPANY\
So an API consumer can find out which BRANDS are owned by which COMPANY
description:
* The relationship ›has-brand‹ is created when the provided IDs of the COMPANY and BRAND are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship and the IDs of both nodes.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›has-brand‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* Each COMPANY can be in a ›has-brand‹ relationship with multiple BRANDS
